reviews.review_text: My first phone in the modern age was a Motorola. I've owned a few others since then, but I never liked them as much as that early Moto. This one is of course more advanced, but still has that quality. If you enjoy streaming music, them is one has great features and clear sound. It still has the FM radio feature. For the money, it's worth it.

reviews.title: Perfect phone
reviews.review_text: Great phone with extra layer of security plus more storage. Screen is large and offers several amenities that other phones lack. Would recommend this Moto to anyone. And take advantage of the FREE promotional offer, you can't do better than that. Love Straight Talk!

reviews.title: Great Deal, Superb Camera, decent connection.
reviews.review_text: Integrates effortlessly with my new Tablet, sharing information immediately, no need for extra apps or complicated web links. It took a few days to get used to the android system, coming from the iPhones IOS system, but transferring data was super easy. Absolutely love the color as well. Camera quality is far superior to the iPhone 14 I was previously using, making it my new go to for advertisement pictures, it was easy to replace my professional camera with this one. I have had some connectivity issues, but living out in the boonies it has been better than I expected. Very happy with this purchase, would recommend.

reviews.title: Was looking for Old Faithful and got A LOT MORE!!
reviews.review_text: I was using an older version of this phone for a couple years with no complaints mostly (until near the end as to be expected) but also with no real raves either. Anyway, I decided to upgrade to THIS, the most recent iteration, as I figured I'd be somewhat familiarized with a new version of the phone I've been using for a couple years rather than jumping into something totally foreign and new. That was a smart choice, and the basic Motorola format, style, features, etc. all translated fairly easily, but I have to say that THIS 2025 model really is exceptional. It looks and feels modern, current, new. It's extremely fast, loaded with great features and apps (a handful of unnecessary/unwanted preloaded apps), the camera is fantastic, tons of storage and a mind boggling amount of storage can be added. Overall, I am very happy with this phone. Enamored enough, in fact, that I eagerly explore every feature and look forward to discovering more. I don't think I've ever had a phone that I was THIS much into right out the gate, and that really says a lot. Excellent!!

reviews.title: Best bang for the buck, service is ðŸ’¯
reviews.review_text: The phone is flawless, absolutely love it and Straight Talk is the absolute best deal on the market for phone plans and service. Second to none, in the mountains of North Ga, everything works absolutely no issues. Use Hotspot all day for YouTube no cap, seriously over 100GB used within the first week and not a bit of slowing down data. Best move ive ever made as far as a cell phone service. The handset was FREE. And it works FuC%$ng perfect. The best!!!!

I had another Moto phone that I loved mostly because it had a great battery. I can all ready tell this battery runs down much quicker. I don't have a problem with Walmart, but the phone is a straight talk phone and I called customer service and they were extremely rude and would not help me setup my phone. Luckily, I was able to text customer service, and I was able to figure it out myself. For these reasons, I will probably not buy another phone from Walmart.

reviews.title: Blessed phone
reviews.review_text: It's been decent so far the Camara is actually pretty nice good quality ui is slow at times and I do have trouble with getting signal in my apartment and surrounding areas usually this wouldn't be an issue as I live a mile away from town other than that this phone is definitely a blessing have a good day Jesus loves you he died for you and conquered the grave to free us from sin and give us a relation with God

reviews.title: Awesome, but there is a problem
reviews.review_text: Almost everything went well. However, the call connection has been dropped several times so far. This issue occurs when I'm not using my home internet. I've called twice and activated the new SIM card, but despite this, the problem has occurred multiple times in this short period.

reviews.title: "No" Block. Money down the toilet.
reviews.review_text: Comes with a charging cord, "No" block. The phone as far as tech goes. Overrated. Would not charge, and good luck trying to find a charging block. I tried to charge the phone with the power cord provided connected to the PC. And that was hopeless. I ended up calling "Straight Talk" Customer Service. To have my other phone re-activated, and ordered a different phone, before I ended the call. I can only assume that the company sent me a refurbished phone, even though it is not mentioned anywhere in the ad. And by the way. That customer service representative who handled my complaint was stellar and great! Also, I can't do a return, cause the phone will not charge. As in, it will not hold a charge. it lights up zero. So I cannot return it back to factory settings. My info is still on the phone. I know now that my seven years of bad luck begins with this company(Motorola). Money down the toilet. Bring Back "LG and Huawei". At least we always knew what we were getting, and where we stood with them.

reviews.title: Piece of junk!!!
reviews.review_text: Biggest piece of junk I've seen. Within 2 months or less it started to not call out when trying to call someone. All I get is a notice that the network isn't available and to connect to wifi calling. This happens most of the time I try to call someone.

was looking for a new phone for space and a better camera and this phone meet and exceeded my expectations also the reviews I read recommended I didn't buy this phone from Walmart because of a activation problems but I had none..great phone .and a good price

reviews.title: I can't get text messages. I need a replacement.
reviews.review_text: I am having trouble with this phone and I haven't even had it a month. I can't get messages from my mother one time she couldn't call me and then one of my other friends aren't getting messages through. I've tried all the stance. This phone is a piece of junk.

reviews.title: Unable to enjoy the phone the proper way due too
reviews.review_text: The service company didn't follow the instructions when I was purchasing this phone it's all a huge mess & I don't think I will ever get the full opportunity to enjoy the full advantages of this cellphone. Lesson learned on my end especially after being a legit loyal never late customer over 2 1/2 yrs. My business isn't welcome here obviously...

reviews.title: Explanation of only 3 star review
reviews.review_text: I took off 1 star because I've experienced a couple of issues of when my alarm goes off, instead of just having the normal push button for snooze or silence the alarm, it's not present & I actually have to open the clock app & turn it off there which is 1 extra step which I don't mind but it omits the option for snooze. Also I've had an issue w an ironic case of while a missed call was leaving me a voicemail, I just so happened received another call that I wasn't even notified of & it didn't even show up in my missed call log . Luckily they left a message & it was recorded there & also in my visual voicemail as it was an important call as it was a from Dr office of whom my Dr referred me to to make an appointment to a cardiologist, so that was a terrible glitch for me personally so why I took a way another star.

reviews.title: Do Not Buy
reviews.review_text: Worst experience with a phone ever., made calls. sent messages but could not receive a text message, even worse is Straight Talk is Verizon . After a couple hours on the phone with Straight Talk and a 35 mile drive to a Verizon store no one could fix my issues finally ened up switching to Cricket Wireless going with a Samsung phone. While in line at the Eastland TX Walmart store another lady had the same Motorola phone with the same problems. This Motorola phone has some serious software issues

reviews.title: Just Got Phone And It's Already Acting Up.
reviews.review_text: I've been having some issues with the phone since it got here. It keeps telling me I can't make a call without using WiFi and I have to take it off of WiFi to use the phone. If it let's me use it at all...I would have to restart the phone to try and clear that up very often.

reviews.title: Awful. Do not buy this phone.
reviews.review_text: Phone is awful. Doesnt want to work in town and will not recieve calls. Sometimes it crashes when trying to make a call and not having wifi. Crashes while I'm doordashing orders whoch is super frustrating. Lags extremely bad when playing fortnite and when playing music from apps. Group texts wont allow you to send messages with an error code saying "to many senders"

reviews.title: do not buy this phone
reviews.review_text: do not waste your money on this phone. the speaker is terrible. half the time people can't hear what you are saying. you can be in an app typing and it will kick you out of the app. half the time you don't have service to make calls. if you are in a group text message, most of the time the messages won't send. it's honestly the worse phone I've ever had. only good thing about it is that the battery is good.

reviews.title: Moto 2025
reviews.review_text: I have had nothing but trouble with this phone. The battery does not hold a charge, sometimes I cannot make phone calls without shutting it off and restarting it. I'll be listening to music and it stops or jumps to a different song. I would highly recommend not getting this phone!!

reviews.title: Not good phone
reviews.review_text: At first battery lasted a long time now don't hold charge all day. My phone slid off table slowly fell 2 ft. I picked phone up all you heard was cracking. My phone already has 2 cracks on screen. I should be getting better signal when outside then in my house I don't get very good signal anywhere I seen to go and all at once I will get a whole bunch of text messages at once. Phone says 5g but don't get good service with this phone

reviews.title: Same as I said above.
reviews.review_text: It takes bout 2 days for it to totally charge. I have a hard time getting a connection cause it wants to connect to the 5g network all the time & I'm my area it's not installed. I'm not a really big fan of Motorola & I've used theirs before, was very unpleased with their products. LG I've used for years & have never had any issues or complaints with their products. Got this cuz my old phone was out dated & needed an upgrade.
volume is great if your like me and watch movies on it.i really depend on my phone since I don't have tv,cable and doesn't drive.its a must for the elderly.very dependable and so much to offer.

reviews.review_text: I have to be very careful when typing a message cause its very touch if i go past the space bar always and i have yo go back to what i am doing every time it very annoying but probable just my fault i guess

reviews.title: Satisfied so far
reviews.review_text: Having cracked the screen on my previous phone, i decided out of necessity to go with this new upgrade, and as of now, I have no complaints and am satisfied with that purchase.

reviews.title: Great phone for the price poor camera quality
reviews.review_text: Great phone doesn't seem to have any issues with slow loading,installs,or functions. Easy to use. One downfall and the reason for 4 stars is the camera doesn't take the best photos but no other issues yet.

reviews.review_text: It's been a terrible experience. My device never came with a sim card like it was supposed to. So I've had to set up an e-sim and since then I've been having so much trouble making phone calls, receiving them and sending text messages.

reviews.review_text: The gboard while searching online is rather small and difficult, but can be moved on the screen. I have failed to find any setting to correct this. Decent Moto for the price, tho.

reviews.review_text: great phone, Great deal. cell reception is better than my old phone. photos are better and the battery last longer. If I crush this one like I did my old phone, I would replace it with the same model. Customer service was fantastic also.
